lines.text: let n , m , a , b , c be long integers
lines.code: long long n , m , a , b , c ;

lines.text: let Yellow , Blue , ans be long integers
read n , m , a , b , c
lines.code: cin >> n >> m >> a >> b >> c ;

lines.text: Yellow is equal to a * 2 + b
Blue is equal to b + c * 3
if ( Yellow is greater than n ) , ans = ans + Yellow - n
lines.code: if ( Yellow > n ) ans += Yellow - n ;

lines.text: if ( Blue is greater than m ) , ans = ans + Blue - m
lines.code: if ( Blue > m ) ans += Blue - m ;
